thread.title: BRIEF-Dmx Technologies Group's Board Proposes Placing Co Under Creditors' Voluntary Liquidation

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dmx Technologies Group's Board Proposes Placing Co Under Creditors' Voluntary Liquidation

organizations.name: brief-dmx technologies group's board proposes placing co under creditors

text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Dmx Technologies Group Ltd:
* BOARD DECIDED TO PROPOSE PLACING COMPANY UNDER CREDITORS’ VOLUNTARY LIQUIDATION
* ‍CO WAS NOT ABLE TO OBTAIN AN EXIT OFFER FROM OTHER PARTIES INCLUDING ITS SHAREHOLDERS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
